channel.title: Players not dropping items on death

item.title: Players not dropping items on death
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

[quote=“The Chubby Bunny, post:4, topic:315907”]no, and I probably wouldn’t give it to you if I did, becuase this is a learning environment.

But if you want to go about creating one, you could declare a boolean, then declare a method that uses the boolean in an If-then statement.
check http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/TOC.html that out.[/quote]

Agh, im not smart enough to comprehend this…ah well…

Read full topic

item.title: Players not dropping items on death
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

no, and I probably wouldn’t give it to you if I did, becuase this is a learning environment.

But if you want to go about creating one, you could declare a boolean, then declare a method that uses the boolean in an If-then statement.
check http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/TOC.html that out.

Read full topic

item.title: Players not dropping items on death
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

The Chubby Bunny:

Well, you have no method or variable declared that drops the players items, you’ll need to find/create that one.

I’m assuming you don’t have one for me?

item.title: Players not dropping items on death
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

Title is self explanatory. Here is the code I have when your health gets to 0 (death)

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) { toX = 2399; toY = 5171; inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; sM("Damn dude you just died that sucks :( !"); resetOtherAtk(); followID = 0; followID2 = 0;

I assume thats it…
